commits.author: Ryan McKinley
Grant Ingersoll
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Accesses a resource by name and returns the (non comment) lines * containing data. * *

* A comment line is any line that starts with the character "#" *

* * @param resource * @return a list of non-blank non-comment lines with whitespace trimmed * from front and back. * @throws IOException */ public List getLines(String resource) throws IOException { return getLines(resource, UTF_8); }
